column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
how can i gain more biceps volume

Weight lifting is one of the best ways to increase biceps volume. Try doing exercises such as curls, overhand rows and hammer curls to target the biceps. Increasing your protein intake as part of a healthy, balanced diet can also aid in gaining muscle mass. Make sure to give yourself adequate rest days and to stretch out the muscles before and after working out.
how can i become more intelligent

Intelligence is not something that can be directly improved - rather, intelligence is the product of different factors. However, there are many things that you can do to help strengthen your cognitive skills. These include reading, pursuing challenging activities, and taking time to practice mindfulness and relaxation. You can also try taking memory and learning enhancers such as nootropics. Staying physically active, eating a healthy diet, and getting adequate sleep will also help to keep your brain functioning optimally.
